summary: A boy raised by wild animals tries to adapt to human village life.
cast: Sabu|Joseph Calleia|John Qualen|Frank Puglia|Rosemary DeCamp|Patricia O'Rourke|Ralph Byrd|John Mather|Faith Brook|Noble Johnson|Bagheera|Rama Bai|Baloo|Hathi|Kaa|Shere Khan|Nick Shaid|Bhogwan Singh
title: El libro de la selva
